dialogues.text: We're going to crash!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The gates loom. Hannah speeds towards them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We're going to crash!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Just fucking do it! 100.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hannah reaches and buckles her seat belt. Jim and Selena brace for impact...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They hit the gates, hard. Jim and Selena fly towards the perspex divider.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Freeze. Held.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A green field, with three white letters laid out across t grass. Spelling:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Waking from a nightmare, Jim's eyes snap open with a shar intake of breath.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: An echo of when we first saw him lying in the hospital. B this time, when we pull away, we see he is lying on a dou bed, in the bedroom of a small farmhouse.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Alone. But Selena's clothes are scattered.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jim rises.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He looks around. Bright daylight is flooding into the roo through the window.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jesus. Not the curtains too.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jim walks down the stairs and peers into a living room - where he sees the sofa, with its cover removed.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jim enters - to find Selena sitting surrounded by lengths material which she is stiching together. 101.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He picks up a length of red material. Once part of the dr

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You looked all right in this, you know.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Selena ignores him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jim walks to the front door and opens it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Pull back to reveal...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A stunning view.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A Lakeland valley, with a single farmhouse, and the black parked outside.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Also outside is Hannah, who is arranging huge lengths of material on the grass.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: From our ground-level angle, there is no sense to be made what Hannah is doing.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And we keep pulling back...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ...fast, down the valley, along a single ribbon of road.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Past a sign: Langdale Valley...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Further, now over a mile distant from the farmhouse, then

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Stopping, abruptly.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: At a single Infected, who sits, emaciated, in the middle the road.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A quiet moment with the starving emaciated Infected. It i weak it can hardly move. Only blink.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Then, in the background, a distant rush of noise, the low roar of a jet engine.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Slowly, the Infected turns its head upwards, where, in th clear blue sky, it sees:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A vapor trail.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A plane. 102.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A silent bird's eye view, looking down, at the valley flo and the farmhouse.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Where, outside, we now make sense of the stitched sheets curtains, as they form letters on the grass below:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But tiny figures are forming a new letter. An O:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Then, in the background, the sound of the jet, the rush o noise.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: There! THERE!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jim, Hannah and Selena look down the valley, where...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ...screaming towards them, flying low along the valley fl comes a jet plane.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They stand transfixed as the plane races towards them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As it passes over, flying directly overhead, the terrific wash of air and noises whips around them, connected with colossal sonic boom...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The boom rolls away, and the plane has passed...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Around Jim, Selena and Hannah, the sheets and material of letters, ripped into the air, now spiral to the ground, falling around them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Do you think he saw us this time?
